div.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2223-7747/8/8/271/s1, Figure S1: Light microscopy images of leaf cross-sections for Dryas octopetala var. asiatica in the warming OTCs (a) and in the ambient control (b), Vaccinium uliginosum in the warming OTCs (c) and in the control (d), Rhododendron confertissimum in the warming OTCs (e) and in the control (f), sampled in July 2017 (measured data in detail in Table 4).
